H0.text: Who did Dr. Crippen murder. A business rival

H1.text: Who did Dr. Crippen murder. A former employee

H2.text: Who did Dr. Crippen murder. A neighbor

H3.text: Who did Dr. Crippen murder. His wife

A4.text: Hawley Harvey Crippen was convicted of the murder of his wife Cora Crippen and sentenced to death
